options.content:
*30 min STANDARD and Custom have their own*
1. Review each environment and if the session values is smaller than the client values, set up time with the owners of the the integration to understand why
2. Review each environment and if any of these settings are larger than 30 min STANDARD and Custom have their own, need to meet with the client.
3. Keep your running notes in a text field for each env

panels.description: Client Session Idle(client.session.idle.timeout) - this setting is the time a client session is allowed to be idle before it expires. Tokens are invalidated when a client session is expired. If not set it uses the standard SSO session idle value.

targets.rawSql:
select c.realm_id, c.client_id,ca.value client_idle_timeout, r.sso_idle_timeout
FROM  client_attributes ca, client c, realm r
WHERE c.id = ca.client_id
and c.realm_id = r.id
AND ca.name = 'client.session.idle.timeout'
ORDER BY ca.value DESC

panels.title: Dev

panels.description: Client Session Idle(client.session.idle.timeout) - this setting is the time a client session is allowed to be idle before it expires. Tokens are invalidated when a client session is expired. If not set it uses the standard SSO session idle value.

targets.rawSql:
select  count(*)
FROM  client_attributes ca, client c
WHERE c.id = ca.client_id
AND ca.name = 'client.session.idle.timeout'

panels.title: Dev

options.content: Feb 8, 2024: No need to enage with any clients. all looking valid

1. Review each environment and if the session values is smaller than the client values, set up time with the owners of the the integration to understand why

panels.title: Client Session Max aka Refresh Max

panels.description: Client Session Max(client.session.max.lifespan') - this setting is the max time for a client session before it expires. Tokens are invalidated when a client session is expired. If not set it uses the standard SSO session max value. D

targets.rawSql:
select  c.realm_id, c.client_id,ca.value
FROM  client_attributes ca, client c
WHERE c.id = ca.client_id
AND ca.name = 'client.session.max.lifespan'
ORDER BY ca.value DESC

panels.description: Client Offline Session Idle (client.offline.session.idle.timeout) - this setting is the time that client offline session is allowed to be idle before it expires. select  c.realm_id, c.client_id,ca.value
FROM  client_attributes ca, client c
WHERE c.id = ca.client_id
AND ca.name = 'client.offline.session.idle.timeout'

options.content: Feb 8, 2024: no issues on current client settings

5 min STANDARD and Custom could have their own

mds-bcmi-4587 - is set to 15 mins as per product team request. this is within their security/stra knowledge base. this is internal to gove only. zorin noting no issues Feb 15.2024

conn-ccbc-portal- set to 8 hours. Feb 23 confirmed with client they have MISO approval and put this info intheir STRA. zorin noting no issues.

oes-wbc-dev  - workbces will look into this. as of april 25, 2024 this has been removed.

panels.description: Access Token Lifespan(access.token.lifespan) - This setting is for the max time before an access token is expired. The value is recommended to be short relative to the SSO timeout. Default set to 5 mins

targets.rawSql:
select  c.realm_id,c.client_id,ca.value
FROM  client_attributes ca, client c
WHERE c.id = ca.client_id
AND ca.name = 'access.token.lifespan'
order by c.realm_id asc

panels.title: Dev

panels.description: Access Token Lifespan(access.token.lifespan) - This setting is for the max time before an access token is expired. The value is recommended to be short relative to the SSO timeout. Default set to 5 mins

panels.title: Prod

panels.description: Access Token Lifespan(access.token.lifespan) - This setting is for the max time before an access token is expired. The value is recommended to be short relative to the SSO timeout. Default set to 5 mins

targets.rawSql:
select count(*),c.realm_id
FROM  client_attributes ca, client c
WHERE c.id = ca.client_id
AND c.realm_id = 'standard'
AND ca.name = 'access.token.lifespan'
GROUP BY c.realm_id

panels.title: Dev Standard TOTAL

panels.description: Access Token Lifespan(access.token.lifespan) - This setting is for the max time before an access token is expired. The value is recommended to be short relative to the SSO timeout. Default set to 5 mins

targets.rawSql:
select count(*)
FROM  client_attributes ca, client c
WHERE c.id = ca.client_id
AND c.realm_id not in ('standard')
AND ca.name = 'access.token.lifespan'
